description:
My place is close to Blue Bottle Coffee, Nitehawk Cinema, Radegast Hall & Biergarten, and egg. You’ll love my place because of the coziness and the location. My place is good for couples.

small but charming one bedroom in the heart of williamsburg, within walking distance to restaurants, bars, clubs and supermarkets, train station a few feet away

the entire apartment

Less than 10 meters away from L [bedford stop] subway
name: small charming 1 bedroom in central  location
review: I had a great time in Manel's apartment. It is as described and exactly what you'd expect in a charming, quirky NYC apartment. The location is ideal for both hanging out in the neighborhood and hopping the train to get to other places (L train connects to all major lines). His place was clean, and he was very helpful when I arrived.
